body:
A staff of life is made of thick polished oak shod in gold and decorated with sinuous runes of silver or ivory, which depict various cycles of life and death according to different cultures. This staff allows use of the following spells:

  • Heal (1 charge)
  • Raise dead (5 charges)
name: Staff of Life
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Life
